title: PBE Problem
body:
So recently I recieved an e-mail from Riot that said that I was accepted to test the PBE. I was real happy for that but when I clicked the provided link to create my PBE account the page kept saying that "Application Recieved" thing and nothing else. I'm not quite sure what is going on but I really would like some help in order to play on the PBE. Thanks in advanced. 
<3 Crispy

replies.body:
Idk what to tell ya. Was there a link in the email you got?
 
Theres.nothing players can do for you and this post is pretty much burried for any reds.to see. 

 Send in a ticket, be proactive about getting in.
I am also having this issue. I submitted a convo before seeing this. Please let me know if there is a fix!
